title: How do they expect your rank to be worth anything?
body:
In my promos for plat 3, won a lot more games then ive lost playing against other plats... then in my last game for my promos i get matched with 8/9 gold players, with me having the gold 5 (9w/9l) that last picks a vayne into a cait/bard lane, with a gp top, sej jg and fizz mid...


How do they expect us not to tilt when they match us with bullshit like this? There is only so much a lb can do even if she solo kills her lane 3 times... 
There might be skill involved in league, but there is no counter play to a trash matchmaking system that screws over its players.

[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/o6ffnq.png[/IMG]

replies.body: Don't worry, i had to attempt my gold 5 promos, with bronze players in my games.
